log_level.name: Log Level
log_level.description: Set the logging level. (Default: INFO) Setting to DEBUG or TRACE may cause performance degradation.

mqtt_url.name: MQTT URL
mqtt_url.description: URL of the MQTT broker. (Address when using mosquitto addon: mqtt://core-mosquitto:1883)

mqtt_need_login.name: MQTT Require Login
mqtt_need_login.description: Enable if the MQTT broker requires authentication. Set to true if using the mosquitto addon.

mqtt_user.name: MQTT Username
mqtt_user.description: Username for MQTT broker authentication. Enter the username configured in the mosquitto addon.

mqtt_passwd.name: MQTT Password
mqtt_passwd.description: Password for MQTT broker authentication. Enter the password configured in the mosquitto addon.

mqtt_topic_prefix.name: MQTT Topic Prefix
mqtt_topic_prefix.description: Prefix for MQTT topics (default: homenet2mqtt). No need to change unless in special circumstances.

config_files.name: Config Files
config_files.description: List of configuration files to load. If left empty, the default (default.homenet_bridge.yaml) will be loaded.

timezone.name: Timezone
timezone.description: System timezone (e.g., Asia/Seoul). If left empty, the server uses UTC timezone, and the UI uses the browser's timezone.
